actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-221.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4035 to authorize supplemental international security assistance for the fiscal year 1979 in support of the peace treaty between Egypt and Israel, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H. R. 4035 (Supplemental international security assistance for Mideast peace).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 4035 to authorize supplemental international security assistance for the fiscal year 1979 in support of the peace treaty between Egypt and Israel, and for other purposes.
